name: Dark Ampharos
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Its brightly lit tail can be seen for miles in the dark, even by ships on the sea.

abilities.name: Conductivity
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to a Pokémon, this power does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power stops working if you have more than 1 Dark Ampharos in play or while Dark Ampharos is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy cards attached to Dark Ampharos or this attack does nothing.
